title: WALKWAY ORB / walkwaycoat
description: This is the third Shivers in the coat quest. It is a challenging orb.

dialogueTree.title: Shivers: "It is harder and harder to reach yo..."
dialogueTree.english: It is harder and harder to reach you... I am not sure how well you'll hear me...
dialogueTree.polish: Coraz trudniej i trudniej do ciebie dotrzeć... Nie wiem, jak dobrze mnie usłyszysz...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Становіцца ўсё цяжэй і цяжэй да цябе дайсці... Не ведаю, ці добра ты мяне пачуеш...

links.title: You: "Please, I want to help you! Where m..."
links.english: Please, I want to help you! Where must I go next?
links.polish: Proszę, chcę ci pomóc! Gdzie muszę się teraz udać?
links.belarusian: Калі ласка, я хачу табе дапамагчы! Куды мне цяпер трэба пайсці?

links.title: Shivers: "Listen within the flower of home… I..."
links.english: Listen within the flower of home… I am lost... Please....
links.polish: Słuchaj pośród kwiatu domu... Czuję się zagubiony... Proszę...
links.belarusian: Слухай сярод кветкі дома... Я адчуваю сябе згубленым... Калі ласка...

links.title: You: "Can't you just tell me where you ar..."
links.english: Can't you just tell me where you are? Or what you are?
links.polish: Nie możesz mi po prostu powiedzieć, gdzie jesteś? Albo czym jesteś?
links.belarusian: Ты не можаш мне проста сказаць, дзе ты? Альбо чым ты з'яўляешся?

links.title: Shivers: "I am lost and unfound... Listen wit..."
links.english: I am lost and unfound... Listen within the flower of home…
links.polish: Jestem zagubiony, nieodnaleziony... Słuchaj pośród kwiatu domu...
links.belarusian: Я згублены, не знойдзены... Слухай сярод кветкі дома...

links.title: Shivers: "Forgive me... I only want reunion....."
links.english: Forgive me... I only want reunion... I am struggling to know where... Listen within the flower of home… Please...
links.polish: Wybacz mi... Chcę tylko ponownego spotkania... Trudno mi stwierdzić, gdzie... Słuchaj pośród kwiatu domu... Proszę...
links.belarusian: Прабач мяне... Я хачу толькі паўторнай сустрэчы... Мне цяжка сказаць, дзе... Слухай сярод кветкі дома... Калі ласка...
